page.title: 11Horsmonden Sports Club
page.content: Formed in l946 the Sports Club has a field and pavilion in Maidstone Road which is used by the Football and Table Tennis Clubs in Winter and the Cricket Club in Summer. The Tennis Club has two hard courts a little further along the road. The swings and slide of the Children's Playground were moved in l984 from the sports field to Lockets Green opposite the school in Back Lane. Once part of the school grounds, Lockets Green now holds the Scout hut and the Youth Club. Situated on the North side of the Village Green the Working Men's Club opens every evening from 6 to ll p.m. and on Sundays from l2 to 2.30 p.m. It was given by the Austen Trustees in l9l9 as a war memorial. The clock tower was built in l887 to celebrate the Jubilee of Queen Victoria.
